title: Daniel Vandermeulen
text:
Daniel Vandermeulen is a Canadian educator. 
He became president of <a href="Nunavut%20Arctic%20College">Nunavut Arctic College</a> in 2007. 
In August 2012, he was appointed <a href="Nunavut">Nunavut's</a> Deputy Minister of Executive and Intergovernmental Affairs, and Secretary to Cabinet. 
Previously working in <a href="Alberta">Alberta</a>, he is President Emeritus of <a href="Northern%20Lakes%20College">Northern Lakes College</a>, and past president of <a href="Northern%20Lakes%20College">Northern Lakes College</a> (1987-2005).
